#library(PopGenome)
library(ggplot2)
library(ape)

library(reshape2)


```{r setpops}
#read in ped file and get hamming distances:


genos <- read.table("out.ped",colClasses="character")
inds <- genos[,1]
genos <- genos[,seq(7,dim(genos)[[2]],2)]
rownames(genos)=inds

dist = matrix(nrow=length(inds),ncol=length(inds))
colnames(dist) = inds
rownames(dist) = inds

for (i in rownames(genos)){
    for (j in rownames(genos)){
    write(i,stderr())
      dist[i,j] = sum(genos[i,]!=genos[j,])
    }
}
            

```


```{r}  
njtree <- nj(as.dist(dist))
plot(njtree,show.node.label = T,show.tip.label = T,
     main="NJ tree barcode SNPs",type="cladogram",cex = 1.1) 


```
